Texts.Eng: Mulch is useful in a ^orange;growing tray^reset; as a ^green;weak fertilizer^reset;. You can craft all sorts of chemicals, plastics and lab-made materials. Be sure to upgrade it when you can!
Texts.Chs: 护根是一种^green;弱效肥料^reset;，可作用于^orange;作物托盘^reset;。请利用炼金台制作各种化学物质吧，如果当炼金台可以升级时，就马上升级它吧！

Texts.Eng: So you've built an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; and want to learn to use it? Simple enough. Just don't blow yourself to bits, please. Place it down and start by making some ^orange;mulch^reset; for fertilizer.
Texts.Chs: 你制作了一个^orange;炼金台^reset;？你打算学习如何使用它吗？其实这很简单，首先你得摆放好，让我们开始做一些^orange;护根^reset;吧。
